column4:
We are looking for a results-driven software tester who will be responsible for designing, maintaining, and running tests on the web application being developed. The software tester will conduct manual testing, record the bugs in Jira and track it to closure. During the design phase, he/she will be working closely with the Web Designer and the Product Owner to understand the functionalities to be delivered. In the development phase, he/she will interact with the development team to provide support and ensure that the code developed meets the business requirements provided in the FRDs.
The software tester should be result-driven, have good communication skills, logical and analytical thinking. Knowledge of automation testing will be an added advantage.
Role and Responsibilities

Review business requirements and define test strategy.
Prepare dataset based on the approved web design
Prepare test cases, test scripts, and test data.
Maintain test cases in Test Rail, plan test runs, and prepare reports.
Execute tests (manual/automated).
Report defects and track them to closure.
Interact with Product owner when required to report on the defect analysis, testing progress, and product functionality.
Analyze test results and track product testing metrics.
Prepare and present test reports
Change Management - Track and deliver change requests


Skills/Values
Any Bachelor’s Degree with 3+ years of experience as a functional tester
Good knowledge of testing web applications
Experience in Automation, Load Testing, Stress Testing, and Responsive Testing will be good to have.
Proficiency in written and spoken English.

Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹25,000.00 - ₹50,000.00 per month
Benefits:

Provident Fund
Work from home

US shift

Experience:

Manual testing: 1 year (Preferred)
Software Quality Assurance Occupations: 1 year (Preferred)
Software testing: 1 year (Preferred)

ArkssTech is looking for a results-driven software tester to be responsible for designing and running tests on software usability. The software tester will conduct tests, analyze the results, and report observations to the design team. You may also interact with clients in order to understand the requirements of the product.
To be successful as a software tester, you should have a working knowledge of software and test design, the capability to run through tests, and the ability to analyze the results. Ultimately, the software tester should be result-driven, have good communication skills, and up-to-date knowledge of software programming and software test design.

Participating in design reviews and providing input on requirements, product design, and potential problems.

Working knowledge of test techniques and compatibility with various software programs.
Working knowledge of programming.
Excellent communication and critical thinking skills.
Good organizational skills and detail-oriented mindset.

Job Description
We are looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) engineer to develop and execute exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality.
The QA role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needs while being cost-effective. If you hold an engineering background and enjoy providing end-to-end solutions to software quality problems, we’d like to meet you.
Ultimately, you should monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.Responsibilities

Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback


Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases


Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities


Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools


Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs


Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved


Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs


Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements


Monitor debugging process results


Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions


Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts


Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies

Requirements

Proven work experience in software development


Proven work experience in software quality assurance


Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes


Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases


Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing


Hands-on experience with automated testing tools


Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus


BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject

About Us:
Onsite is a well-funded startup, founded by alumni from IIT and ISB and backed by VC funds and some of the leading Tech Entrepreneurs of India. Onsite aims to transform the construction industry through digitization and has built a Mobile-first Project Expense and Collaboration tool for MSME Contractors. Onsite mobile application is currently in use by 100,000+ Contractors, Project Managers and Supervisors in more than 500 cities of India.

WEB DESIGNER (Interaction Design)
Role Web DesignerLocation RemoteAbout Design Brewery:
Design Brewery believes in being more than just an agency. It believes in partnering with its clients to provide them with optimal design and marketing solutions. It believes in being bold and whacky with its ideas while providing end to end solutions that make a difference to their client's top lines. Further, with its integrated and customized suite of solutions cutting across its three design verticals, namely - Graphic design, UI/UX & Web design and Product/Industrial design & Digital Marketing, it becomes a one-stop-shop for all design services, saving its customers the hassle of dealing with multiple design agencies.
Responsibilities:
Conceptualizing creative ideas with clients.Testing and improving the design of the website.Establishing design guidelines, standards, and best practices.Maintaining the appearance of websites by enforcing content standards.Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for clients.Working with different content management systems.Communicating design ideas using user flows, process flows, site maps, and wireframes.Incorporating functionalities and features into websites.Designing sample pages including colors and fonts.Preparing design plans and presenting the website structure.
Requirements:
A relevant diploma in a related field.Experience with interaction design.Proficiency in graphic design software including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and other visual design tools.Proficiency in front-end development web programming languages such as HTML and CSS, JQuery, and JavaScript.Good understanding of content management systems.Good understanding of search engine optimization principles.Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues.Excellent visual design skills.Up-to-date experience with international web protocols, standards, and technologies.Creative and open to new ideas.Adaptable and willing to learn new techniques.Excellent communication skills.
What you can expect at Design BreweryYou will have the opportunity to work on both Print & Digital Media. You have the creative freedom to tackle the design problems in your own unique way befitting the brand and its visual language. You would have the support of your team who are from well know design colleges like NIFT, Srishti School of Design, etc. A typical day at Design Brewery would involve anything and everything from Brand Campaign ideas, Brochures, flyers, Office graphics, Corporate Stationery, Packaging design, etc.

We’re a fast-growing company with clients in the United States, UK, and Europe. We are also a certified AWS partner. Modify existing software in AWS to improve performance.


Actively contribute to Open Source initiatives.


Be solving challenging issues.


Have to examine data to grasp issues, draw conclusions, and solve problems.

Who Are We Looking For Exactly ?

You have 2+ years of relevant experience


You design and deploy scalable, highly available, secure, and fault-tolerant systems on AWS or other such services Amazon EC2, Amazon S3.


You have experience using RDS and VPC.


You have experience using tools such as CloudWatch and Route53.


You are familiar with distributed revision control systems such as Git.


You are familiar with AMI and Auto Scaling.

You consistently demonstrate strong verbal and written communication skills as well as strong analytical and problem-solving abilities


You should have a Master’s Degree /Bachelors (BS) in computer science, Software Engineering, IT, Technology Management or related degrees and throughout education in English medium.

You have experience working on Kafka.


You have familiarity optimizing CICD and containerization tools.


You have experience with IIS and Code Deploy.


You have experience writing shell scripts / powershell scripts.


Preferably AWS Certification.

Performance review and Appraisal Twice a year.


Competitive pay package with additional bonus & benefits.


Work with US, UK & Europe based industry renowned clients for exponential technical growth.


Medical Insurance cover for self & immediate family.


Work with a culturally diverse team from different geographies.

Company Description
RMgX is a Gurgaon based digital product innovation & consulting firm. Here at RMgX, we design and build elegant, data-driven digital solutions for complex business problems. At the core of solutions crafted by us is a very strong user experience practice to deeply understand the goals and emotions of business and end-users. RMgX is driven by a passion for quality and we strongly believe in our people and their capabilities.
ROLE EXPECTATIONS
This role requires bright people who not only understand and have a penchant for software project management but also have a flair for understanding business problems and technology-based solutions. We need people who are passionate about solving business problems through technology. Extremely strong drive to learn new stuff/tools and who have an excellent eye for details.
ROLE PURPOSE
1. Delivers project(s) on schedule and within budget, while satisfying agreed-upon customer requirements and specifications within the scope of the project.
2. Responsible for the appropriateness, quality, and timeliness of all aspects of the project(s), manages the production of project estimates, develops project schedule, establishes measures and milestones, tracks ongoing project progress.
3. Mobilizes necessary resources, assembles project team, assigns individual responsibilities, identifies appropriate project resources, and provides guidance and direction to project team members.
4. Proactively manages risks, issues, and scope through-out the project lifecycle, prepares/presents project plans/status reports to organizational leadership, project teams and client/customer groups.
KEY ACCOUNTABILITITES

Technology: Coordinates recommendations for technology solutions that address client requirements identified during the project life-cycle.
People: Provides challenging environment, directs and motivates the project team, and establishes and effective climate for achieving positive working relations with other stakeholders (e.g., client, management).
Customer: Understands customer goals and requirements, represents RMgX Technologies to the customer, and manages customer expectations and dependencies.
Business: Understands the client’s business contexts and how the project impacts the client’s business results; and maintains an awareness of changing business needs and external influences, recognizing their potential impact on project goals.
Financial: Achieves contractual commitments related to quality, cost, and schedule. Facilitates the review of risks and develops appropriate risk mitigation plans.

WORK EXPERIENCE

The position requires 3-5 years of experience
Must have handled client interactions and planned and managed projects

SKILLS, ABILITIES & KNOWLEDGE

Excellent written and verbal communication
Understanding of systems engineering concepts
You must have in-depth understanding of User Experience concepts
Knowledge of Agile Scrum methodology

Qualifications
BE, B. Tech. or MCA/MS (Computer Science / IT) from reputed institute and Management/Business Consulting degree
Additional Information
Flexible working hours, Saturday and Sunday's are fixed off, Free health Insurance

FQA Tester
The Games QA Tester will be responsible for ensuring the quality of motion sensor based mobile games on iOS, Android and Web platforms; Testing of video games on PC /game consoles. You will be working in an energetic and highly creative environment along with a group of highly talented, passionate, and successful individuals.
The job entails testing games software and identifying and reporting bugs and issues, following a structured testing methodology to the highest possible specified quality standards, and always in full compliance to defined information security policy and controls. This involves testing the game in a systematic way, based against defined set of criteria, identifying problems and communicating those issues via bug tracking databases and other mechanisms back to the Quality Assurance Coordinator. You will test for bugs in the software, from complete crashes to minor glitches in the code. You also act as the game's first audience, often being asked to report on its playability, and identifying any aspects which could be improved. The Tester will also be responsible for providing feedback where any test cases, templates or tools used are in need of improvement. Helping our clients pass their products through the certification/submission process smoothly and painlessly is number one priority.
Key Responsibilities and Activities
 Review game design and requirements documents and develop test plans Test and report issues using JIRA, an issue tracking system used by the company. Work with the production team on prioritizing the issues. Work closely with product team and designers to understand requirements for the purpose of quality assurance. Work independently with minimum guidance. Video game enthusiast with a knack for finding bugs Work as member of team assigned to a project for testing a specific game Execute and update Test cases assigned as per instructions and timelines Identify and report functionality bugs Write all bugs in conformance to internal standards and project specific requirements Update all bug databases with accurate and complete information Complete all tasks assigned, as per instructions and timelines Work closely with other team-members to share, discuss and clarify issues essential to effective execution of project Identify and help implement opportunities for improvement in security, quality and process controls Perform all tasks in strict compliance to Information security policy and quality standards
SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE AND ABILITY Avid gamer - highly skilled in game play Exceptional attention to detail Strong critical thinking - ability to identify issues and bugs in games Excellent written communication skills - ability to describe identified issues in clear and concise manner Strong proficiency in usage of standard software and tools on pc & internet Effective time management – ability to complete assigned tasks in timely manner Passionate for console gaming Desire to work in a creative and innovative environment Team-work – ability to work closely with other team-members Flexibility to adapt to changes in customer /project requirements and instructions, and to work as per shift-timings applicable to project
EDUCATION 0 to 3+ years of experience in QA testing of iPhone / iPad applications Qualified B.Tech/ B.E. / Any Graduation (only if a gamer) Bachelor degree in technology, animation, game design or equivalent relevant experience Testing Course ISTQB qualified preferred

Software DeveloperGurgaon, HaryanaRemote Working Options Available Maximum Salary 15 LPA (Dependent on Experience)+ Extensive Benefits Package
SSP is a global provider of technology systems and solutions across the entire insurance industry. We provide core technology solutions, distribution and trading capability, advanced analytics and solution delivery.
The wellbeing of our employees is of paramount importance to SSP, and as such, we moved all our employees to working from home before the official shutdown in India. Our employees have continued to work from home during the crisis with no loss of service to our customers and we are incredibly proud of how well our teams have responded and adapted to this challenge. We are committed to continuing with home working until it is safe for our employees to return to the office. We are an equal opportunities employer and are willing to be flexible for the right candidate.
Want to want to work with great people, in modern offices and have the opportunity to progress and develop your career? Our team is growing, so we are on the lookout for a passionate Software Developer to join our Engineering team in Gurgaon Office.
THE PURPOSE OF THE SOFTWARE DEVELOPER WILL BE: We are growing our Gurgaon office for Software Engineers who can contribute to the programming innovative solutions which will include projects across a variety of solutions in Digital, SaaS/PaaS, DevOps and Cloud in a global team. You will get involved in testing, module development in current and new environments, contribute to development processes, procedures and leading with examples and ideas. As a Software Engineer you will be working with systems that deal with millions of insurance quotes a day and so, by using your knowledge and experience of software engineering, you will help the team continue to provide market leading solutions to our customers.
WE’D LIKE TO MEET A SOFTWARE DEVELOPER WITH: 

Technical graduate- B.tech/B.E., or equivalent qualifications, plus considerable work experience in a relevant role. OR Substantial work experience in a relevant role
Demonstrable 3+yrs practical experience in the development of software for external customers
Ability to work within agreed time estimates
Track record for thinking about more than technology issues, and for integrating the technical with the business and information aspects for complete solutions
Proven history of quickly comprehending the functions and capabilities of new technologies, understanding how new capabilities can be integrated into the SSP solution, to add value to SSP and our customers.
Good working knowledge and responsible attitude to development standards and the software development lifecycle
Understanding agile software development lifecycle
Insurance industry experience, preferably from an Insurer or commercial broker perspective
Design and implementation of high transaction solutions.
Knowledge of TDD, SOLID principles, multi-threading, garbage collection & Apache Cassandra database

Technical skills required: -

Asp.net
SQL Server (2005/8/12)
Web services/WCF
MVC
XML/XSLT/XSD
TFS/Azure
Visual Studio 2010 upwards
Visual Basic 6.0
IIS Configuration
NuGet Packaging

THE SOFTWARE DEVELOPER RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE: 

Applies data analysis, data modelling, and quality assurance techniques, based upon a detailed understanding of business processes, to establish, modify or maintain data structures and associated components (entity descriptions, relationship descriptions, attribute definitions).
Advises database designers and other application development team members on the details of data structures and associated components.
Specifies user/system interfaces and translates logical designs into physical designs taking account of target environment, performance requirements and existing systems.
Produces detailed designs and documents all work using required standards, methods and tools, including prototyping tools where appropriate.
Designs, codes, tests, corrects, and documents moderately complex programs and program modifications from supplied specifications, using agreed standards and tools.
Conducts reviews of supplied specifications, with others as appropriate.
Identifies and resolves issues with applications, following agreed procedures. Uses application management software and tools to collect agreed performance statistics. Carries out agreed applications maintenance tasks.
Develops a broad understanding of technical publication concepts, tools and methods and the way in which these are implemented.
Develops an understanding of development support activities, such as information gathering, user task analysis, creating draft documentation, and illustration, and printing and publishing. Works with colleagues and clients to create new sections of technical documentation through all stages of the publication process as support literature.
Defines the integration build and produces a build definition for generation of the software. Accepts software modules from software developers, and produces software builds for loading onto the target hardware from software source code.
Configures the hardware environment, produces integration test specifications, conducts tests and records the details of any failures. Carries out and reports fault diagnosis relating to moderately complex problems.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?A unique, modern working environmentClubs – Crickets and Chess activities, JOSH club for social events, quarterly company Town Hall eventsYammer – collaborate on ideas and suggest future business opportunities through our ‘lightbulb’ groupsA clear, personal learning and development plan to develop your career furtherGenerous holiday allowance (32 days + Public Holidays).SSP flexible benefits and Day care Facilities, Maternity pay, Flexible working option
BEHAVIOURS: 
We have a strong, clear vision – to be the leading provider of insurance technology software – and our values describe what makes SSP unique, and capture the SSP spirit that runs through everything we do.
Respect – Ownership – Collaboration – Innovation – Energy
A CAREER WITH US: 
SSP believes the most valuable asset for any business is the people it employs. It is crucial therefore to employ and invest in the best.
At SSP we believe that our diversity makes us stronger. As an equal opportunities employer we celebrate and support everyone who works for us. We are committed to providing equal opportunities in our working practices and are proud of our inclusive culture.
It goes without saying that we do not discriminate on any basis. Instead we continue to actively promote equality and grow our diverse workforce for the benefit of our customers, products, our business and our people.

Who we are: 
Irdeto is the world leader in digital platform cybersecurity, empowering businesses to innovate for a secure, connected future. Building on over 50 years of expertise in security, Irdeto’s services and solutions protect revenue, enable growth and fight cybercrime in video entertainment, video games, and connected industries including transport, health and infrastructure. With teams and offices around the world, Irdeto’s greatest asset is its people and diversity is celebrated through an inclusive workplace, where everyone has an equal opportunity to drive innovation and support Irdeto’s success. Irdeto is dedicated to being the security partner to empower a secure world where people can connect with confidence.
The Role: As our new Software Engineer colleague, you will be exposed to technologies like Java, PHP, Javascript/Typescript, Python, Groovy, Jenkins, Linux, Git, AWS, SQL, Kubernetes, Docker, Pytest.
Your mission at Irdeto: 

Develop, improve, maintain and document clean code, in an agile manner, as part of a Scrum Team
Design and implement Media Manager, both backend and frontend, with a focus on service performance and reliability
Pair programming and code reviews
Participate in quality assurance activities, including test case creation, automation and execution, at every level, from unit until system testing
Contribute to the maintenance of development, testing and delivery tools and frameworks
Collaborate to the creation and maintenance of CICD pipelines, together with the DevOps engineers
Challenge old habits, bring new ideas

How you can add value to the team?

A Bachelor’s / Master’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a similar field
Solid professional programming experience in Java, PHP and Javascript/Typescript.
Experience or affinity with cloud technologies (AWS, etc.)
Experience with Quality Assurance (besides unit testing, also component, integration, system and acceptance testing and automation at every level)
Exposure to delivery tools (Jenkins, Gitlab CI, etc.) and versioning systems (Git, etc.)
Experience in SQL (preferably MySQL) and NoSQL is a plus
Experience in Symfony and Doctrine is a plus
Experience in Angular is a plus
Experience in the development, test and delivery of large scale, high traffic, highly reliable back-end systems is a plus
Experience in Docker is a plus
Knowledge of scripting languages (Python, Groovy, etc.) is a plus
Proficient verbal and written English communication skills

What you can expect from us: 
Irdeto is a people first organization where you can secure your future. Our values of Trust, Accountability, Agility and Innovation inform our culture. We believe in connecting people and developing careers with a strong focus on collaboration, creativity, health and happiness among our globally diverse workforce.
In addition to competitive remuneration and extensive benefits we offer:

An international & multicultural environment where diversity and inclusivity are celebrated and embraced


Professional educational opportunities and training program


Innovation sabbatical


Volunteer Day


State of the art office space


On the job coaching and mentoring


Flexible work arrangements – via our Work Hard Anywhere policy.


Some of us run city marathons and even go on snowboarding trips together!


Casual Friday? Casual every day!


US$ 500 net for your home office setup after you passed your trial period


And many additional perks customized to global locations (canteen, fresh fruit, amazing coffee, parking, on-site gym, yoga room to name a few)

With over 50 successful years of business innovation behind us, and an exciting digital and connected future ahead of us, Irdeto is a progressive company to join. We are looking for people who will keep us at the forefront of innovation and creativity.
Welcome to Irdeto! 
I*rdeto is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on identity or innate characteristics, instead we aim to build a diverse, inclusive culture where your talent counts. *
At Irdeto, we appoint based on merit, following a fair and transparent process and we welcome applications from everyone regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation, faith or disability.

Job Description
We are looking for a Node.js Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
We're looking for someone who is comfortable with a fast-moving environment and can learn quickly.

column4:
Zentron Labs (www.zentronlabs.com) is a Bangalore based start-up company with deep expertise in the field of Machine Vision based Automation. We have focused on developing vision based high speed and offline measurements, as well as inline colour and size-based sorting systems. We have R&D Centers in Bangalore and Trichy
At Zentron, Instant Measurement Machine (iMM) and GTRon are used for Computer Vision based assessment of quality of products during the manufacturing process. These hi-tech products leverage multi-disciplinary technologies such as computer vision, embedded software, state of the art UX and product design.
As a python software engineer you will be part of iMM software team, you will be responsible for design and development of key components of iMM software. You will be part of the Trichy development center.
Work location - Trichy, Tamil Nadu.
Job Responsibilities
Job responsibilities include the following:
1. Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and high-performance applications
2. Design and Development of technical solutions for the new features of iMM.
3. Integration of user-facing elements with server-side logic.
4. Integration of data storage solutions.
5. Performance tuning and improvement to meet the real time requirements.
Job Requirements
1. Strong knowledge and hands on experience in Development using Python.
2. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming paradigm using python.
3. Proficiency in Python to develop reusable, testable, and efficient code.
4. Excellent grasp of basic data structures and algorithms.
5. Conversant with UML design practices including creation of sequence diagrams & state diagrams.
6. Experience in taking the software development through all aspects of Software Development Life Cycle.
7. Ability to translate requirements into system design.
8. Strong debugging skills and ability to read and modify existing code easily and quickly.
9. Experience in using C-types/CFFI preferable.
10. Experience in designing and developing application from scratch.
11. Must be a team player and work collaboratively with teams to understand the product requirements.
12. Desirable to have working knowledge of C
Educational Qualification
Bachelors/master’s in engineering in CS/EC/IT.
Experience
3-5 years of experience in software development using Python. Highly preferable to have a good knowledge C coding.

AxCrypt is one of the world’s most popular file encryption solutions, with over 20 million downloads over the past 20 years. Security is crucial to us. Everything we do with AxCrypt is done with security as the highest priority. Encryption is complicated, but this does not keep us from constantly working to simplify it for the user. This shows, as we have been mentioned and rated over the years by many as the best software for encryption.
AxCrypt Software Pvt Ltd is looking for ambitious developers who are interested in building world class file encryption software in C# on all major platforms including Windows desktop & server, macOS, iOS and Android using .NET and Xamarin .
You will be working with developing new and improving existing features for our award-winning file encryption software AxCrypt. Depending on your skill set and interests you will also be involved in DevOps, release management, regression testing, 1st, and 2nd level end-user support, and UI and UX design.
Requirements

BE or B Tech or higher in Computer Science or equivalent experience
Minimum 3 years professional experience in C# development
Xamarin Forms or similar cross-platform frameworks
Excellent written and spoken English

Preferred Qualifications
The successful candidate will have good or excellent skills in several, but not necessarily all, of the following technologies and tools:

WPF
Windows Forms
XWT
.NET async and .NET multithreading
REST Web AP
Cryptography
Visual Studio 2015 or newer
Git
iOS or Android development
ASP.NET MVC
IIS
Windows Server
Web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
VueJS

Personal qualities
AxCrypt is a very advanced encryption platform used by very normal people to protect their files against disclosure. It must be stable and trustworthy to a very large degree. You have:

An agile and analytical mindset
A high degree of attention to detail
A drive to write high-quality clean code
A strong will to collaborate
A creative approach to problem-solving
A wish to make hard problems look easy or even go away

About AxCrypt
AxCrypt is both the company and the product.
The company is a Swedish company with offices in Bengaluru, India. Read more about us at https://www.axcrypt.net/ .
The product is a world-class award winning file encryption software with millions of users on all major desktop and mobile platforms. We are using the Microsoft / Xamarin / C# / .NET technology stack, but will use the tool best suited for the task. Up to 90% or more of the code is shared between all platforms ranging from iOS to the web. A large part of the core code and the entire Windows Desktop application is open source, available on request.
Being a developer at AxCrypt means working in a small company with many technologies, on all platforms. This is a unique possibility to learn about cross platform development with C# and Xamarin. You will be working with modern technologies and modern agile development methods in central Bengaluru.
AxCrypt is an exciting opportunity to work with advanced encryption technologies and gain experience in one of the most rapidly expanding technology segments.

About Consilium Software: 
Founded in 2007 Consilium Software is incorporated in Singapore, with software development and engineering labs in India, and subsidiaries and branch offices in India(New Delhi), Malaysia (Kuala Lumpur), Taiwan (Taipei City), Indonesia (Jakarta), Thailand (Bangkok), Australia (Melbourne) and Canada (Toronto.). Raised Series A funding from a leading investor, supported by Singapore economic development board (EDB), and strong technology alliance with global leading companies like Cisco, Salesforce, Amazon, Oracle and SAP.
Consilium Software and our Uni™ digital customer engagement platform have helped over 1,000 companies in 110+ countries connect their employees with customers. Our choice of cloud-based and on-premise software powers 3 billion-plus interactions each year, simplifying the management of voice, video, and digital channels. Consilium conceives, develops, and delivers enterprise software for unified communications (UC) and contact centers to power transformative Customer Experience Management (CEM.) Consilium is led by practitioners who have differentiated customer experiences through every major cycle of evolution for 30 continuous years.
We encourage you to visit our website https://www.consiliuminc.combefore the interview and https://bit.ly/Consilium_Software to get an overview of our company and products.

WHY WE ARE DIFFERENT:SabPaisa’s payments and collection application suite - white labeled to multiple publicsectors and private banks including BOI, BOB, IDFC First& Indian Bank - has alreadyprocessed more than INR 37 billion, a figure that will grow exponentially over the nextseveral months as SabPaisa's payment applications continue to penetrate the fastest-growingsegment of the data and payment digitization sector.We are changing the way financial institutions, hospitals, government bodies, SAAS & e-commerce companies, schools, colleges, universities, councils, trusts, etc. collect money anddata from their clients and customers.Our executive team consists of senior members with more than 90 years in banking andtechnology having brands in their resumes like IIT, IIM, ICICI, HDFC, Axis, etc.Headquartered in New Delhi and led by a team with deep expertise in the banking andpayments domain, SabPaisa is currently poised for explosive growth and is looking to growits team with dynamic, smart, and ambitious people with an enormous appetite for learningwho would love to be a part of a payment start-up success story.
In summary, we are a fast-growing, inclusive payment platform company with an immediateneed to hire a Project Coordinator to help our team be productive and happy.
WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US1. Opportunity to work with and learn from CXOs in a relatively flat organization2. Opportunity to work in a future-oriented organization where degrees don’t matter, onlyyour performance does3. Opportunity to learn and execute with a number of latest digital tools in your domain, someof them AI propelled4. Opportunity to grow at a fast pace if you can prove your mettle5. Opportunity to work in a productive and happy office where you will be from time to timetaking part in potlucks, dancing and singing competitions, and prying people away from tabletennis tables6. Competitive pay with potential for bonuses
WHEN YOU SHOULDN’T JOIN USYou will be working with and learning from busy people whose time is pretty valuable, soyou shouldn’t join us1. If you don’t like to write or document carefully2. If you are not self-motivated and need to be pushed or have someone follow-up with you3. If you cannot self-learn and execute with the help of Google Search4. If you cannot pick-up new software tools quickly or the opportunity to work with latesttools doesn’t excite you5. If you are not disciplined and don’t schedule/execute your tasks in a disciplined/diligentway or don’t manage your projects well on your own6. If you are solely working for money, and not also for learning and work fulfilment that willpropel your career growth
WHAT WILL YOU BE DOING ON A REGULAR BASIS (RESPONSIBILITIES) 2+ years of experience in IT Service/Product domain only 1+ years experience of managerial experience with team handling & cross-departmentcoordination experience Bachelor’s degree required Excellent project management skills, with interpersonal skills and communication inEnglish, Hindi, and Bengali Create buy-in for the product vision both internally and with key external partners

Ansys is the global leader in engineering simulation, helping the world's most innovative companies deliver radically better products to their customers. By offering the best and broadest portfolio of engineering simulation software, Ansys helps companies solve the most complex design challenges and engineer products limited only by imagination. 
 

Summary / Role Purpose 

 Join the Ansys Customer Excellence team to partner with our customers to engineer enterprise-level software solutions and grow Ansys' business. Primarily working under direct supervision of your manager, you will contribute to the development of Ansys Platform solutions and supporting systems. In this role,you will collaborate with a team of expert professionals to accomplish solution development objectives. 
 

Key Duties and Responsibilities 


Perform basic development activities, including the design, implementation, maintenance, testing and documentation of software modules and sub-systems 
Learn and employ best practices 
Perform basic bug verification, release testing and beta support for assigned solutions.Research and resolve problems discovered by QA, field, or customer 
Work under the close supervision of a development manager 



Minimum Education/Certification Requirements and Experience 


Required education and degree type: BS in Engineering, Computer Science or related field 
Required minimum years of professional experience in an engineering software environment: BS+0 
Logical problem-solving, strong interpersonal and communication skills, fluent in writing and speaking English 
Strong organizational and time management skills, possesses a sense of urgency 
Projects a professional image and demonstrates business acumen, driven to succeed 
Ability to build trusting relationships and effectively interact with customers 
Capability to work independently, as well as with others in a fast paced, diverse team environment with continually evolving priorities 
Experience with programming languages such as JavaScript, PHP, .NET, C#, HTML 5, PowerShell, REST API 
Knowledge of SQL query and basic database management 



Preferred Qualifications and Skills 


Preferred education and years of professional experience in an engineering software environment: BS+2 or MS+0 
Basic understanding of the software development process 
Ability to learn quickly and to collaborate with others in a geographically distributed team 
Experience with authoring in Microsoft tools such as Power BI, Power Automate, Power Apps, Power Query, DAX 
Familiarity with code version control and deployment techniques 
Practical experience managing WordPress sites 



CULTURE AND VALUES
 Culture and values are incredibly important to Ansys. They inform us of who we are, of how we act. Values aren't posters hanging on a wall or about trite or glib slogans. They aren't about rules and regulations. They can't just be handed down the organization. They are shared beliefs - guideposts that we all follow when we're facing a challenge or a decision. Our values tell us how we live our lives; how we approach our jobs. Our values are crucial for fostering a culture of winning for our company: 
 

Customer focus 
Results and Accountability 
Innovation 
Transparency and Integrity 
Mastery 
Inclusiveness 
Sense of urgency 
Collaboration and Teamwork 



WORKING AT ANSYS
 At Ansys, you will find yourself among the sharpest minds and most visionary of leaders, collectively aiming to change the world with innovative technology and remarkable solutions. With the prestigious reputation in servicing well-known, world-class companies, standards at Ansys are high, met by those willing to rise to the occasion and meet those challenges head-on. Because at Ansys, it's about the learning, the discovery and the collaboration. It's about the "what's next" as much as the "mission accomplished". It's about the melding of disciplined intellect with strategic direction and results that have, can and will impact real people in real ways, forged within a working environment built on respect, autonomy and ethics.
 
 At Ansys, you will find yourself among those eager to drive the world towards the next best thing with hands planted firmly on the wheel.
  Our team is passionate about pushing the limits of world-class simulation technology so our customers can turn their design concepts into successful, innovative products faster and at lower cost. As a measure of our success in attaining these goals, Ansys has been recognized as one of the world's most innovative companies by prestigious publications such as Bloomberg Businessweek and FORTUNE magazines.
 
 Ansys is an S&P 500 company and a component of the NASDAQ-100.
 
 For more information, please visit us at www.ansys.com
 
 Ansys is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.
 
 Ansys does not accept unsolicited referrals for vacancies, and any unsolicited referral will become the property of Ansys. Upon hire, no fee will be owed to the agency, person, or entity.

Reporting Manager: - CTO
Experience: - Minimum 5 + years of experience
Salary: ₹500,000.00 - ₹800,000.00 per year
Job Type: - Full-time 
Job description : -.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR
We are looking for Test Engineers to be a part of IDCUBE's Customer Delight team of the Product Engineering department. IDCUBE is looking for a person with a zeal to ensure impeccable software quality by scrutinizing the functionalities and usability. The customer delight team even identifies design flaws and recommends simple yet effective solutions. The test engineer should be able to understand & replicate actual usability scenarios to ensure an excellent user experience.
Other responsibilities: -

Creating manual and automated test scripts for assessing software features.
Developing and implementing software testing programs.
Improving the performance of software testing systems.
Generating test reports and suggesting software fixes

Desired Candidate Profile: -

Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science (Preferably M.Tech), or a similar field.
Minimum 5 to 8 years of work experience as a Software Test Engineer.
In-depth knowledge of program testing software like Selenium tool etc.
The candidate should be familiar with SDLC(Software Development Life Cycle), STLC(Software Testing Life Cycle), and DLC (Defect life Cycle).
The candidate should have experience in Black box and White box testing techniques.
Knowledge of Web Service Testing(SOAPUI or POSTMAN).
Knowledge of Mobile App Testing(Android & IOS) is a must.

WHAT WE ARE EXPECTING
As you are going to be a part of a product engineering Team serving Global customers competing with American & European brands therefore following are our minimum expectations:

Zeal to implement innovative ideas for better results.
An ownership attitude for the tasks assigned to them.
At IDCUBE "Not my work" frame of mind is considered rude to other team members.
"Professionals looking for a standard 9 to 5 job need not apply." You will have to be flexible to complete the task on hand.
As IDCUBE develops a system that includes both Hardware & Software components, therefore, working from home is not possible. Candidates looking for WFH need not apply.

WHO WE ARE
IDCUBE is INDIA's one and only IOT based Physical Access Control solution developer, having offices in India, USA, UAE, and Malaysia. We deliver an on–prim and cloud-based Physical security experience platform to distributors and system integrators. Our in-house product engineering is the best in the industry. We are the most globally recognized INDIAN product having 3000+ successful installations in more than 20 countries.

column2: Boston Consulting Group340 reviewsNew Delhi, Delhi
column4:
WHAT YOU'LL DO Our mission is to continuously improve our IT systems and services, support the business and strive to create and innovate with technology. 
 
 As an IT Lead your role is to help coordinate the daily IT operations within the local office. By working closely with a team of IT Specialists and Senior IT Specialists, the IT Lead proactively oversees local IT projects, provide solutions to issues, and manages local stakeholder relationships alongside the IT Manager to ensure the team is delivering a high level of customer care to all stakeholders. This includes, but is not limited to, user support, computer setup, maintenance and service, telecommunications, assisting with network and infrastructure maintenance, and all other technology needs in BCG offices.
 
 You report directly to the Local IT Manager and are able to perform successfully in a fast-paced, high-performing, service-oriented environment. You interpret rules and guidelines flexibly to enrich the business and in keeping with BCG’s values and culture.
 

Key responsibilities: 

Leading the IT service operation in the offices within your remit
 Supporting the BCG user community by adhering to best practises while on-site in BCG offices, at client locations and at special events e.g. executive speeches, press conferences, offsite meetings etc. 
Lead in preparing and deploying laptops for staff, including all required user profile configuration and data migration as well as maintain configurations of computer systems according to established BCG requirements 
Coordination of local office asset maintenance 
Provide proactive support for onsite AV resources and ensure training is provided to the BCG user community where necessary 
Manage and coach all direct reports with regular check-ins to ensure performance is of a high standard, opportunities for professional growth is discussed, as well as providing timely and honest feedback when required 
Lead on projects in an operational capacity for both global and local initiatives 
Coordinate the completion and resolution of all tickets through the IT service management ticketing system as well as regular checks to ensure agreed SLA’s and KPI’s are being met 
Assist with managing the analysis on operational KRIs to facilitate communication and improve quality and performance 
Delivering regular updates to the IT Manager highlighting the team’s activity, pressure points and upcoming activities 
Providing mentorship, guidance and feedback to junior team members and provide input on performance of team members to the IT manager 


YOU'RE GOOD AT Key strengths and attributes needed to succeed in the role: 
 
Analytically solving problems by using strong technical, organizational, and team working skills 
Structured and logical approach to work 
Building and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders and vendors 
Communicating effectively, both verbally and in written form, with management groups, business service teams, external vendors, and technical staff 
Coordinating and prioritizing daily team workload and managing first level escalations 
Demonstrating interpersonal skills when coordinating daily support requests assigned through various channels (email, phone, ticketing system, live walk-ins, etc.) 
Acting as a technical expert by consistently evaluating existing systems and recommending technology for replacements and/or upgrades 
Displaying a high level of emotional intelligence, steadfast composure, tact, patience, and the ability to handle stressful situations 
Flexible approach to working outside of business hours to meet deadlines 

YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS)
 Essential 

Profound education and professional experience 
Experience in effectively communicating and presenting technical concepts to management, peer group and staff 
Superior knowledge of commonly used IT concepts, practices, and procedures 
Analytical skills and mindset to drive CSAT/ESAT scores 
Experience independently resolving issues related to (but not limited to) Windows, Office Suite, Browser , and VPN/network connectivity. 
Experience with the following areas: PC/laptop hardware, telecommunications, mobile devices, networking, and server administration 
Video conferencing/meeting setup and troubleshooting experience – Currently BCG supports Zoom and WebEx tools 
ITIL Foundation certified (v3 or v4) and/or a clear understanding of the ITIL system and ticketing process 
LAN and IP networking knowledge and ability to approach issues logically using OSI model or similar 
SCCM or other imaging software experience 
Experience with cloud technology 
VoIP experience 
Project management experience 
Experience with office fit outs/buildouts 

Desirable 

Knowledge of tools such as Tableau, Alteryx and MS Project 
Experience using collaboration tools such as Slack and Trello 
Knowledge of Agile operating models 
Knowledge of Networks and Infrastructure 

WORKING ENVIRONMENT

Overview

   Imagine a career where your creative inspiration can fuel BIG innovation. Year-over-year, Intuit has been recognized on Fortune's “
  100 Best Companies to Work For” and at the top of Fortune World’s “Most Admired Software Companies.” This is the culture that fosters innovation and growth in our products: we change the financial lives of more than 50 million personal users and 7 million small businesses.
 


 Intuit’s products are the financial software of choice for business and financial management solutions for small and mid-sized businesses, consumers, financial institutions and accounting professionals. You probably know us by our flagship products, Mint, QuickBooks, TurboTax but that's just the start. Over 50 million users and 7 million small businesses depend on Intuit because we innovate at the crossroads of real customer problems and breakthrough technology. Over 20% of the US GDP flows through our products.
 


 Intuit’s 
  CX3 Group includes TurboTax US product, US’s best-selling do-it-yourself tax software and the market leader in tax prep software. We empower people to get great money outcomes with ease. TurboTax Canada owns a market share of more than 70% with revenue of more than $450 million USD. The product is used by US citizens for preparing their tax returns while being developed in Bangalore. The team has end to end ownership of TurboTax development from Bangalore.
 


 Come and be an invaluable addition to the small but highly talented, enthusiastic, dedicated, self-motivated and innovative team in Intuit as part of the TurboTax Desktop US product in CX3 Group team as a 
  Staff Software Engineer. We are looking for Tech leader with a passion for innovation to join our team.
 


 What you'll bring

 3+ years experienced as an established leader of software engineering teams that have successfully delivered customer-driven software products.
 Passion for being at the leading edge of technology with a minimum of 8-12 years of hands on software development experience
 5+ years in delivering Consumer applications on the Windows platform using C#, .NET, WPF, C++ technologies.
 Strong technical skills with the ability to review architectures and design. Provide inputs and be the key enabler of the right technical decisions for the product.
 Demonstrated experience leading positive change, empowering people, cultivating product technology visions and innovative solutions, and fostering effective engineering teams.
 Adept at articulating the product vision and drive the future roadmap with strong business acumen
 Ability to think and act strategically for all stakeholders
 Experience in managing the product charter for a product engineering team in partnership with program and product management.
 Experience with Agile development methodology
 Possesses strong verbal and written communication skills.
 Adept in project management and working in a distributed global engineering ecosystem.
 Experience in managing product transitions and setting engineering teams ground-up across teams would be plus.
 B.E/B. Tech/MS/MCA or equivalent



 How you will lead

 Lead high performing team and deliver awesome product experiences
 Embrace new ideas that produce outstanding results for our customers.
 In this role, you will help to help to bring out the best ideas from the best engineers by empowering them and leading by example.
 Your team will create and bring customer driven software products to market that simplify and solve for current customer needs while building for the future.
 Passion for Consumer offerings and hands on experience in Microsoft Technologies –C#, WPF, CLI/C++, C++
 Drives the technical charter of the product and capable of translating the technology roadmap into epics and stories. Capable of driving the technical initiatives to maintain the health of the product.
 Create shared vision and build and maintain strong cross-functional relationships / alignment with partners across the business (e.g. Program Mgmt., Product Management and Release Engineering).
 Work closely with Architects, Technical leaders and partner with other engineering teams to define delivery plans and own the outcome of the projects
 Own end to end engineering from requirement, design, development, quality and release.
 Inspire and mentor engineers to realize their full potential and nurture competencies in the team

Ansys is the global leader in engineering simulation, helping the world's most innovative companies deliver radically better products to their customers. By offering the best and broadest portfolio of engineering simulation software, Ansys helps companies solve the most complex design challenges and engineer products limited only by imagination. 
 

Summary / Role Purpose 

 The R&D Engineer is responsible for the development of software products and supporting systems. In this role, the R&D Engineer will use advanced technical and problem-solving skills to help the team tackle complex issues, satisfy customer requirements, and accomplish development objectives. The candidate must possess a thorough knowledge of cross-platform technologies. 
 

Key Duties and Responsibilities 


Build a solid understanding of the code and the team's software development processes. 
Deliver code that meets requirements on schedule.Ensure that code is efficient, scalable, maintainable, extensible, robust, and easy to understand. 


Create unit, regression and/or system-level tests to thoroughly validate new features or changes. 
Communicate clearly and work closely with manager, technical leads and other engineers to refine solutions and to describe changes that may affect others. 
Learn and follow best practices in software engineering 


Participates in planning, architecture and research 



Minimum Education/Certification Requirements and Experience 


BE/B.Tech. or ME/M.Tech.in Computer Science or related field, with 1-3 years' experience 
3-year experience in C#/C++ with broad and deep understanding of the language 
Working knowledge of the Linux operating system 
Strong background in data structures, algorithms, and debugging 
Ability to learn quickly, understand complex systems and to work closely with others 
Ability to complete high-quality work on time 



Preferred Qualifications and Skills


Experience in a large-scale commercial software development environment 
Good communication and interpersonal skills 
Ability to learn quickly and to collaborate with others in a geographically distributed team 
Linux experience is desirable 



CULTURE AND VALUES
 Culture and values are incredibly important to Ansys. They inform us of who we are, of how we act. Values aren't posters hanging on a wall or about trite or glib slogans. They aren't about rules and regulations. They can't just be handed down the organization. They are shared beliefs - guideposts that we all follow when we're facing a challenge or a decision. Our values tell us how we live our lives; how we approach our jobs. Our values are crucial for fostering a culture of winning for our company: 
 

Customer focus 
Results and Accountability 
Innovation 
Transparency and Integrity 
Mastery 
Inclusiveness 
Sense of urgency 
Collaboration and Teamwork 



WORKING AT ANSYS
 At Ansys, you will find yourself among the sharpest minds and most visionary of leaders, collectively aiming to change the world with innovative technology and remarkable solutions. With the prestigious reputation in servicing well-known, world-class companies, standards at Ansys are high, met by those willing to rise to the occasion and meet those challenges head-on. Because at Ansys, it's about the learning, the discovery and the collaboration. It's about the "what's next" as much as the "mission accomplished". It's about the melding of disciplined intellect with strategic direction and results that have, can and will impact real people in real ways, forged within a working environment built on respect, autonomy and ethics.
 
 At Ansys, you will find yourself among those eager to drive the world towards the next best thing with hands planted firmly on the wheel.
  Our team is passionate about pushing the limits of world-class simulation technology so our customers can turn their design concepts into successful, innovative products faster and at lower cost. As a measure of our success in attaining these goals, Ansys has been recognized as one of the world's most innovative companies by prestigious publications such as Bloomberg Businessweek and FORTUNE magazines.
 
 Ansys is an S&P 500 company and a component of the NASDAQ-100.
 
 For more information, please visit us at www.ansys.com
 
 Ansys is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.
 
 Ansys does not accept unsolicited referrals for vacancies, and any unsolicited referral will become the property of Ansys. Upon hire, no fee will be owed to the agency, person, or entity.

Ansys is the global leader in engineering simulation, helping the world's most innovative companies deliver radically better products to their customers. By offering the best and broadest portfolio of engineering simulation software, Ansys helps companies solve the most complex design challenges and engineer products limited only by imagination. 
 

Summary / Role Purpose 

 As a Microsoft Solutions Architect you will demonstrate outstanding functional leadership, a strong commitment to innovation and a passion for driving the business technology horizon forward. You will have outstanding communication, presentation and collaboration skills. You will possess in-depth technical and business value knowledge of Microsoft solutions. You will enhance our knowledge and skills base best practices as we deploy Microsoft technologies to create a dramatically more personal, integrated computing experience. The Microsoft Solutions Architect will be responsible for the analysis, design, and implementation of Microsoft solutions in a global enterprise environment. A successful candidate for this position will be able to demonstrate proficiency with the design, implementation and support of Microsoft technologies and possess strong project management and communication skills. 
 
 Microsoft technologies are a foundation for our global successes worldwide. The solutions architect will have a wide remit to enhance our services and lead technology-based change across the organization. Key focus areas will be: 
 

Automation and integration 
Rapid deployment of O365 technologies 
Audit, reporting and analytics 



Key Duties and Responsibilities


Leads strategy, best practices and architecture in the design, development and deployment of scalable and secure Microsoft solutions 
Management of stakeholders, setting expectations on delivery and scope 
Lead the implementation and execution of technology deployments in a DevOps environment 
Manage the technology pipeline, aligning priorities and schedules with business expectations, resources and dependencies 
Lead the integration and automation architecture for Ansys IT internal systems 
Take ownership of issues, using sound judgement to propel issues to resolution 
Serve as the technical lead and subject matter expert on projects, overseeing the work of others and being accountable for the quality goals of the project 
Work with peers and SMEs to create complete solutions designs 
Offer reviews of activities in both operations and the business 
Develop and communicate task level detail for project plans 
Develop architectural standards, blueprints, building blocks and patterns 
Prepare budgetary recommendations as needed 
Mentor peers in proper vendor-certified techniques, methods, standards and processes 
Provide leadership and guidance to staff, fostering an environment that encourages employee participation, teamwork, and communication. 
Own components of the technical relationship between Ansys and Microsoft, communicating changes in Microsoft product roadmaps, best practice and deployment patterns within Ansys. 



Minimum Education/Certification Requirements and Experience


Bachelor's degree in computer science, business, management disciplines, or related field 
8+ years of systems design experience 
10+ years of experience in technical roles; working with service based solutions, designing and working with enterprise implementations 
Experience of integration and automation initiatives orchestrated around CMDB platforms, e.g. ServiceNow 
Software development experience, especially within a DevOps/Agile environment 
Candidates must have advanced understanding of the following: Microsoft Active Directory, Windows Server products, DNS, DHCP, Powershell, Group Policy, Microsoft Azure cloud services, identity management, Azure SSO, server/client model, and life cycle management 
Hands-on design and implementation planning for Microsoft solutions including integration, security, governance and compliance solutions in Azure and Office 365 
Experience deploying and managing security technologies and conformance with regulatory and statutory frameworks 
Adapt and learn quickly; keeping pace with the rapid changes in the IT industry particularly in productivity, collaboration, and cloud 
Proven problem analysis and critical thinking skills; excellent verbal and written communication skills 
Ability to balance multiple priorities in pressure situations 
Thorough knowledge of project management techniques and success factors 
Demonstrate excellent stakeholder management skills. Able to manage the expectations of customers as well as influence senior stakeholders 
Experience of creating high quality documentation and solution architecture artefacts 



Preferred Qualifications and Skills


Core competencies for this position also include effective time management, problem solving, customer focus, a drive for results, the ability to communicate effectively, teamwork and organization skills 
Certifications of interest (not required, but preference given): 
   
Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert (MCSE) 
Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) 
TOGAF 9 
ITIL v3 FOUNDATION

Associate Developer- Java Developer - Pune, India
 


   Want to work on global strategic initiatives with a FinTech company that is poised to revolutionize the industry? Join Convera as an Associate Java Developer and help shape our company’s digital capabilities and revolutionize an industry!
 


   Motivated by our values: Customer Champions, Growth Minded, Truth Seekers, Fast Movers, High Achievers, Respectfully Candid
 


   We are the largest non-bank B2B cross-border payments company in the world. Formerly Western Union Business Solutions, we leverage decades of industry experience and technology-led payments solutions to deliver smarter money movements to our customers – helping them capture more value with every transaction.
 


   Convera serves more than 30,000 customers ranging from small business owners to enterprise treasurers to educational institutions to financial institutions to law firms to NGOs.
 


   We make moving money so easy, that any company in the world can grow with confidence.
 


   We’re seeking an Associate Java Developer based in our Pune, India office. In this role, you will be responsible to develop, implement new software, maintain and improve existing software.
 


   Sound interesting? As an Associate Java Developer your responsibilities will include but not limited to:
 

 Ensuring that software functionality is implemented with a focus on code optimization
 Troubleshooting application issues and coordinate issue resolution with operations, functional, and technical teams
 Recommending improvements to existing software programs
 Working with a software development team and Service providers in a geographically distributed structure
 Works independently on simple to medium complex projects



   What you will need to succeed:
 

 B.E. / B.Tech. / MCA in Computer Science, Engineering or related field is required
 4-6 years of development experience in Sprint-boot, Angular2-8.
 Strong Core JAVA, J2EE concepts
 Exposure to relational databases, NOSQL is a plus
 Experience on Core Java including OOPS, exception handling, Collections Framework, abstraction, inheritance etc.
 Experience in using J2EE APIs like JPA, JTA, JMS, JDBC etc.
 Strong experience in Spring framework including dependency injection, IOC, Springboot etc., experience in containerization, API Gateways is a plus
 Experience with cloud native, cloud enabled applications is required
 Troubleshooting application issues in a complex code base
 Comfortable with a Scrum project management style
 Comfortable interacting with customers to solve issues and discuss technical questions
 Prior experience with financial domain is a plus
 Experience in Java full stack development.
 Knowledge of architecture design concepts, object-oriented design and techniques
 Knowledge of logical and physical database architectures and operating systems
 Experience in Agile and Iterative development methodologies
 Technical areas of expertise:


 Experience in Spring Boot
 Good understanding of OOPS, Security concepts with Java language
 Must have written/consumed Spring boot Services
 Must have Knowledge Frontend UI framework AngularJS, Angular2-8
 Must have Knowledge in creating docker container and deploy it in AWS.
 Must have working experience of Store procedure, Function, View, Table & Trigger using Ms-SQL
 Will be of value added if worked in Jenkins knowledge (CI/CD)
 Fluency working with Git, Core Security concepts and threats
 Good knowledge of Testing Framework – Nunit, Protector
 Thorough knowledge of Tools - JIRA, Jenkin, Visual Studio 2017, SQL Management Studio
 You must be a problem solver with a can-do attitude
 You must be a self-starter with ability to multi-task, prioritize self-assignments, manage workload, and consistently deliver results
 You must be a quick learner



   Join us, and let’s move money simply, securely, smartly
 

   Convera is delivering solutions ranging from simple currency exchanges to sophisticated risk management solutions and platforms. Everything we do is designed to enhance the customer experiences and seamlessly power their global commerce needs. It’s an exciting time for our organization, as the largest non-bank cross-border payment company in the world serving over 30k customers in more than 200 countries. If you’re ready to unleash your potential to help drive change, apply now.
 


   We’re a company on the move, and we want our people to grow and develop. You’ll have plenty of opportunities to learn new skills and build a career, as well as a great salary and benefits package.
 

   We are passionate about our diversity. column1: Software Development Engineer Test - Linux And Mac (Remote)
column4:
#WeAreCrowdStrike and our mission is to stop breaches. As a global leader in cybersecurity, our team changed the game. Since our inception, our market leading cloud-native platform has offered unparalleled protection against the most sophisticated cyberattacks. We’re looking for people with limitless passion, a relentless focus on innovation and a fanatical commitment to the customer to join us in shaping the future of cybersecurity. Consistently recognized as a top workplace, CrowdStrike is committed to cultivating an inclusive, remote-first culture that offers people the autonomy and flexibility to balance the needs of work and life while taking their career to the next level. Interested in working for a company that sets the standard and leads with integrity? Join us on a mission that matters - one team, one fight.
 


   The Product:
 

   CrowdStrike Falcon Host is a two-component security product. One component is a “sensor”, which is a lightweight agent installed on client machines that observes system activity and recognizes malicious behavior, then provides on-box prevention capability and remote telemetry to the Falcon Host cloud. The cloud component aggregates sensor telemetry for each customer’s network, can correlate malicious behavior across multiple machines, and presents our customers’ operations teams with a prioritized summary of the threats detected in their environments.
 


   About the role:
 

   This is a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) position in the engineering team. This role focusses on development of automation framework and scripts, tools, harnesses, and specialized tests for the sensor end-to-end testing and/or performance of the product. SDETs may also participate actively in design and code reviews, and collaborate with the cloud and UI teams to assure end-to-end system functionality. They may also work with cross-functional team and product management to understand the use cases and end to end scenarios.
 

 Responsibilities:
 



     Developing and supporting effective and reusable tests, scripts, tools and test setup for developing tests effectively; the goal is to minimize the test cycle and have an extensive coverage to test the product wrt funcitinality and/or product performance
   


     Identify and write specialized tests across platforms such as Linux, and MacOS to ensure the quality of the system as a whole – focusing on end-to-end test/customer scenarios inclusive of API and UI automation.
   


     Work collaboratively with the rest of the team to control risk, improve quality, and streamline release cycles in a continuous integration model
   


     Work with cross-functional team to understand the end to end product use cases.
   



   Requirements for the candidate:
 



     Relevant Automation experience level 5 to 11 years.
   


     Proven experience in test automation, extensible test development, test planning, test case designing and test execution
   


     Hands on experience on writing quality code in any programming or scripting language for Linux and/or Mac supported platform. Having knowledge on Python is a plus.
   


     Hands on experience to any of the CI/CD tools and process such as Jenkins / Bamboo
   


     Automating scenarios for System or Product’s Perf measurement is good to have
   


     Knowledge of Ansible, Jira, TestRail, is good to have.
   


     Knowledge of enterprise applications deployed to cloud environments such as AWS/GCP is a plus
   



   #LI-KK1
 


   Benefits of Working at CrowdStrike:
 



     Remote-first culture
   


     Market leader in compensation and equity awards
   


     Competitive vacation and flexible working arrangements
   


     Comprehensive and inclusive health benefits
   


     Physical and mental wellness programs
   


     Paid parental leave, including adoption
   


     A variety of professional development and mentorship opportunities
   


     Offices with stocked kitchens when you need to fuel innovation and collaboration
   




    We are committed to fostering a culture of belonging where everyone feels seen, heard, valued for who they are and empowered to succeed. Our approach to cultivating a diverse, equitable, and inclusive culture is rooted in listening, learning and collective action. By embracing the diversity of our people, we achieve our best work and fuel innovation - generating the best possible outcomes for our customers and the communities they serve.
  



   CrowdStrike is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex including sexual orientation and gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.

Job description
We are looking for React.js developers that have a solid knowledge of modern (ES6+) Javascript. Working mainly on the front-end part of our application, you will build user-facing components and implement them with different workflows and tool chests like Redux and Flux. Your primary task is to develop a stable, robust, aesthetic, and maintainable product. You also need a good understanding of the toolchain of modern web development, including packers and transpilers, and apply these pragmatically to achieve high-quality deliverables.
Key Roles and Responsibilities: 
- Should know both types of components functionality (functional as well as a class component).
- Must know about reusable components creation.
- Must have the knowledge to trigger/render the page on a particular event.
- Should know how react-redux works.
- Should know how to set up actions and reducers, private routes, 404 routes, 301 - 302 redirection.
- Should be able to work in any UI packages (Material UI / Ant design/ bootstrap/Reactstrap).
- Should know Store procedure.
- Should have knowledge of CSS/SCSS minification as structured code.
- Must be able to enable any port to run the project.
- Must have a good knowledge of rest APIs development.
- Should know code compression using node/express.
- Should know about separate routes creation.
- Knowledge of MVC structure formation using Mongodb schema/ rest APIs.
- Must know MySQL and MongoDB database queries.
- Should know proper response format for each API (standard format).
- Should be able to create Documentation of APIs.
- Should have knowledge of email firing 3rd party integrations.
- Payment gateway handling from a server as well as from the frontend.
- Should know about Proper data security from the frontend and backend using validations.
- Should know error handling.
- Should have knowledge of file handling to upload files from frontend to backend.
- Should know about git connectivity.
- Should know about Project deployment in development or production mode.
- Provide estimates to app requirement requests with an accuracy of 90%.
- Be more communicative and be clear in communicating.
- Be more PROACTIVE than Reactive.
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Development or related field, or relevant experience.
- Dedicated team player.
- Solid ability in both written and verbal communication.
- Knowledge of programming language and technical terminology.
- Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express them.
- The high degree of independent judgment.
- Able to solve complex problems.

Yearly bonus

Overview Our formula for innovation begins with agile, cross-functional teams that welcome diverse perspectives and embrace collaboration. Inspirational working environments help spark fresh ideas, with state-of-the-art technology and creative workspaces that allow our team to decide how they want to work. And our shared commitment to make a meaningful impact for our customers helps us push the boundaries of technology to uncover new possibilities. If you have a commitment to excellence and a passion for innovation, come join our team.
 
 What you'll bring

 An engineering or equivalent degree, and related to computer science.
 Prior experience in backend/server side/ platform engineering domains (or) have to be full-stack developer.
 Hands on coder with strong engineering fundamentals. Experience preferably on Java with Sprint boot and well versed with service development, and understanding of different scalable architectures are expected. Ability to work on databases (sql and no-sql) are a requirement.
 Hard core trouble shooting skills are a must. 
Open source contributions, public github demonstrations, self-driven technical initiatives are expected.
 Uniqueness in thought process, ability to stand out, being highly innovative are expected traits. 
Strong knowledge of domain/products that you have worked on is expected.

 Ability to be a mentor and grow engineers around you is an expected skill.
 For exploring, prototyping and designing one or more components to be deployed in AWS.



 How you will lead

 Play a key role and lead an area of ownership in the platform engineering space. 
Demonstrate high degree of ownership and take initiatives at work.
 Partner effectively with all team members to deliver against commitments. Your ability to influence and collaborate with teams is a key quality that is expected.
 Operate with urgency and speed to benefit. Expect to think strategically at all times.
 Support key platform initiatives to develop services for Intuit.
 Successful delivery of high quality REST web services software (requirements, design, code, documentation, etc.).
 Approximately 80-95% hands-on coding.
 You care about all aspects of software engineering and are always keen to learn new languages algorithms data structures techniques tools libraries services processes.
