About Walmart
 Human-led and tech-empowered since 2002, Walmart Global Tech India delivers innovative solutions to the biggest retailer in the world Walmart. By leveraging emerging technologies, we create omnichannel shopping experiences for our customers, across the globe and help them save money and live better. Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people, and put a smile on their face. Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech. Were a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists, and service professionals within Walmart, the worlds largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. A core philosophy at Walmart is operating with everyday low cost (EDLC). We use technology to operate smarter and deliver everyday low prices (EDLP) to customers and members.

About Lululemon India Tech Hub
 The Hub is key to our business strategy. Weve grown quickly since our inception in 1998, and our continued global growth through market expansion is one of our five goals. We believe that this strategic investment in the India Tech Hub will support our growth, elevate the athletic apparel shopping experience and increase the global talent pool for our current and future technology needs. The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems. The team in India will work as an extension of the global Technology team on projects of strategic priorities.
 Job Description
 About the role:

 Lead a team of developers with varying levels of experience in a product workstream. Coach and contribute to the development of technical team members through consistent and kind guidance, mentoring, and learning sessions
 Work closely with Solution Architects to support and drive solution implementations
 Lead development of scalable, secure modern micro-services using Spring Boot, test-driven development, and cloud-native design patterns.

 Facilitate and lead reviews of technicaldesignsand codewith members of the technical team
 Provide L3 support for Production issues & Prepare system for Peak performance scaling
 Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field
 At least 4+ years experience as Technical Lead
 8+ years experience developing applications using Java, Spring boot, Servlets, Java Web Services, and developing RESTful APIs using JAX-RS and JSON
 3+ years experience designing design scalable, secure modern micro-services using Spring Boot, test-driven development, and cloud-native design patterns.
 Strong understanding of microservice architecture & knowledge of challenges related to building cloud-native apps
 Demonstrable experience with application performance tuning, monitoring, and alerting
 Hands-on working experience with AWS or GCP cloud technologies and platforms
 Strong database design skills

 Experience working in a DevOps environment utilizing CI/CD, containerization, and container orchestration.
 Experience with transforming a legacy monolithic application to a microservice-based application is a plus
 Commerce domain knowledge is a strong plus
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills
 Ability to work independently with minimal direction be a self-starter with strong initiative, and ability to manage/execute workload to deliver high-quality results.


 Must Haves

 Acknowledges the presence of choice in every moment and takes personal responsibility for their life.
 Possesses an entrepreneurial spirit and continuously innovates to achieve great results.

 Leads with courage, knowing the possibility of greatness is bigger than the fear of failure.

Job Description
 About Zipcar India:

 Zipcar Technology Innovations Pvt Ltd. (ZipCar IDC) is a rapidly growing organization which develops technology for the new products of Zipcar Inc. We are building an exciting new product that empowers people to create better futures by offering mobility options that are affordable, flexible, dependable, and hassle-free. Its a big challenge and has the potential to disrupt a $90 billion dollar market. This is a diverse, complex, and multi-state product with some big opportunities ahead of us.
 We operate like a fast growth startup under the Zipcar brand and are hiring team members to join us! The technology, developed by ZipCar IDC, is aimed to power the companys next stage of growth which redefines the future of urban mobility. We are hiring to build the Mission teams who would work on critical product development from ideation to deployment and scale the technology to launch new products and support the growth of business. We are looking for people who love high velocity start-up environment, solving problems at scale using the latest technology and take pride in making an impact.

 Product Manager
 As a senior product leader, your mission is to build, manage, and enhance our core platform and services across Zipcars new product offerings. In this role, you will lead the design and development of new tools and services that enhance our global member experience. If you like the challenge of shaping the future of urban mobility, apply today!

 What youll do:

 Build a vision and own mission critical applications for a newly launched product vertical
 Design, implement, and champion end-to-end user experiences across member engagement, identity verification, customer care, and billing platform
 Partner with engineering to define technical product requirements
 Identify and evaluate key partners and vendors, both business and technical, to launch and expand our product offerings
 Partner with key internal stakeholders to drive improvements to platform health and member success KPIs (e.g. approval rates, risk score, lifetime value)
 Implement policies or product changes to enable a seamless yet secure member experience across all touchpoints (signup, authentication, booking, account management, vehicle access, call center contact)

 What Youll love about being a Zipster in Product Management

 Being accountable to getting stuff done while holding each other and our stakeholders to KPIs and maintaining a high bar for end-user experience
 Collaborative and respectful team environment where we constantly learn from our end-users, each other, and iteratively test product features
 Opportunity to make a huge impact on Zipcars current and future product offerings, working closely with engineering teams and architects to extend our platform
 Join a team of problem-solvers that use data analytics and qualitative feedback to map out and manage product roadmaps
 Seeing your work make an immediate impact to members, globally


 What drives success for this role:

 Over 5 years of experience in software product management. Platform or technical product management background preferred
 Ability to define technical platform requirements that connect to business needs using data to formulate hypothesis, and map out third-party tool integration workflows and APIs
 Partner with engineering teams to prioritize backlogs, writing clear user stories that articulate desired customer functionality
 Acts as a advisor to the business verticals, being able to quickly grasp key objectives and translate these into identity service requirements
 Excellent written and verbal communication skills
 Past experience on working on a product from ideation to launch
 Familiarity with platform products and working in a high-growth environment are a plus

About Advance Auto Parts
 Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider that serves both professional installer and do-it-yourself customers. As of October 5, 2019, Advance operated 5,000 stores and 152 Worldpac branches in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The Company also serves 1,260 independently owned Carquest branded stores across these locations in addition to Mexico, the Bahamas, Turks and Caicos and British Virgin Islands. The Advance Global Capability Center (GCC) in Hyderabad, India, opened in 2019. It is a key enabler and hub of innovation for the company, a place where talented Team Members provide support to our North American-based teams across a variety of functions to deliver on our Mission: Passion for Customers Passion for Yes!
 Job Description
 SUMMARY
 The IT Senior Auditor is a key role that supports the execution of the annual audit plan, by leading teams to perform risk-based audits through the application of critical thinking skills, IT knowledge and innovative audit techniques.

 In addition to typical IT audits, youll have the opportunity to advise on system implementations, integrated operational audits, process changes and other business initiatives with the ultimate outcome of providing assurance to the Board and Senior leadership as to the level of control and process effectiveness across the company. The teams priorities are risk based and focus on strong governance, transparency, strategic engagement and fostering a diverse and inclusive culture that focuses on people development.

 ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES(Travel 0-10%)

 Develops a working knowledge and understanding of the Company. Actively develops relationships and collaborative partnerships within IT and other assurance teams.
 Leads, plans, executes, and documents audit test work using a risk-based approach to help identify process improvement opportunities and diagnose IT risks.
 Proposes viable recommendations and solutions to identified audit issues and process improvements.
 Work on data analytic requests to support the IA group
 Provides leadership and support on special projects, department initiatives, and other activities depending on the needs of the business.
 Communicates effectively and proactively, with business contacts in all phases of audit execution, including final results and recommendations both orally and in writing.
 Ability to leverage and use technology effectively, including data analytics techniques for audits, visualization tools for dashboarding and Audit / GRC technology to improve workflow.
 Displays Advances cultural values and fostering an inclusive and collaborative work environment.


 QUALIFICATIONS

 Strong technical knowledge of a wide range of IT areas including software development and implementation, IT infrastructure, cloud technology, network operations, data centers, and cyber security.
 Understands and is able to teach audit concepts to staff (audit process, how to identify risks, controls, gaps and opportunities).
 Experience building risk and control matrix and creating test steps for controls.
 Solid critical thinking and analytical skills with the ability to quickly assess operational / financial concepts, draw conclusions, and solve complexproblems.
 Demonstrated ability to effectively navigate ambiguous, complex processes and situations independently, with limited management involvement.
 Strong communication, facilitation and interpersonal skills including the ability to build relationships and interact effectively across the business
 Able to present and write audit reports summarizing audit results covering observations and management action plans.
 Demonstrated project management skills, organizational skills and ability to prioritize assignments, deal with interruptions, and multitask / meet multiple deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
 Maintains the highest level of ethics, integrity, and professional judgement in all activities and at all times as a representative of the Internal Audit function and Advance Auto Parts overall.
 Experience with data analytics tools or querying language like SQL or query builders.
 Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel, Access, and PowerPoint.

 EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE

 Minimum 4-8 years of relevant experience.
 Bachelors degree in Management Information Systems, Computer Science, or related technical fieldfrom a four-year college or university required.
 Working knowledge of IT standards such as ISO, COBIT, and NIST preferred.
 Understanding of IT concepts including infrastructure, networking, development, etc., strongly preferred.
 Experience using data analytics techniques as part of an IT audit and working knowledge of any data analytics (e.g. PowerBI, Snowflake, Tableau, ACL, IDEA), audit management software or GRC technology, a plus


 CERTIFICATES

 CISA, CISSP, CIA, CGEIT, CFE and/or other relevant certification(s) strongly preferred.


 PHYSICAL DEMANDS
 The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

 While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit and talk or hear. The employee is occasionally required to stand; walk; use hands to finger, handle, or feel; reach with hands and arms; and stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl. The employee must regularly lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, and ability to adjust focus.

 WORK ENVIRONMENT
 The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.

ABOUT SAP Fioneer
 DEDIQ is a Munich-based, operative investor focusing on innovative and fast-growing companies. For our new FSI Unit (SAP Fioneer) emerging from a strategic partnership with SAP, we are looking for dynamic new colleagues to build up and develop our financial solutions for the next generation banking and insurance industry.
   Our vision for the banking and insurance companies of the future are customer centric high touch lifestyle institutions with efficient data management, state of the art regulation, based in the cloud.
   SAP Fioneer will use its agility to build a modern, cloud focused FSI specific portfolio. The company will offer solutions to financial service providers tailored to address their needs and that cover their operative processes end-to-end. This will help banks, insurers, and other corporations to lower the need for home-grown solutions to enable new business models achieving rapid innovation, low IT cost and getting to a simplified operating model.
 


 EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS
 In role as Developer, you have the opportunity to work on the entire lifecycle of development projects, both customer specific and SAP-defined. This includes the analysis and specification of the customer-specific business requirements as well as the design, implementation, maintenance and in case of cloud services operation of customer-specific solutions.
 


EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES


Bachelor's Degree/Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or similar, required. 
Strong communication skills are desirable




 WORK EXPERIENCE


8-12 years of relevant experience in software development in skills listed below.
Strong knowledge in ABAP programming, ABAP Core Data Services (CDS) modelling and OData
Knowledge of Transactional Banking(TRBK), Payment Engine(PE), Master Contracts Management (MCM) will be added advantage
Exposure to agile development methodologies like Scrum
Understanding of SAP UI5 and Fiori would be added advantage.
Ensure excellent quality and maintain high standards in all processes listed in the relevant process map 
Work with geographically distributed teams seamlessly.
Ability to work effectively in a fast paced and changing business environment. Flexibility and adaptability are must haves to be successful in this role 

LOCATION
 Pune / India
 


 EXPECTED TRAVEL
 0..10%

 To harness the power of innovation, Fioneer invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.

column1: IT Operation and Service Manager – Systems Management
column4: JOB DESCRIPTION  Summary Enterprise Infrastructure, the IT Infrastructure group at Ubisoft, is looking for a talented IT Operation and Service Manager in Shanghai to support their growth as our new colleague. As part of this domain, you'll be joining Ubisoft's IT and more specifically responsible for the corporate IT infrastructure and provides services required by all teams at Ubisoft such as networking, storage, directory services, system configuration and deployment tools. In this role, you will support the World Operation Director and Regional Manager of Enterprise Infrastructure team in overseeing work quality and service level for the team under his/her management. The incumbent will help follow up on and validate the team's work and coach team members all while bringing your communication, analysis and organization capabilities to the table. Responsibilities 1. Work as both an IT Operation and a Service Manager under a matrix management structure. 2. As the Service Manager: o Lead a global IT service team focusing on Linux Systems Management whose team members are located worldwide. o Manage the capacity resource allocation as per priorities to ensure smooth execution of IT strategy and clean roll out of projects. o Develop KPI and data driven system availability reporting and ensure the monitoring of adherence to high operational standards. o Establish a continuous improvement mindset in the team, define and implement the service improvement plans in an iterative approach. o Incident Management and vendor cases follow-up as part of Follow-the-Sun supporting efforts. o Fuel automation efforts to reduce manual operations and increase overall efficiency. o Be the main point of contact regarding feedback about vendor operation quality/reactivity. o Provide operational perspectives on the service architecture and design to clients and provide strategic counsel the visibility. o Represent the team and service in various global meetings and processes. 3. As the IT Operation Manager: o Manage the growth of APAC Systems Management team and the development of its team members. o Focus on creating an environment built on trust, open communication, creativity, and team spirit. o Represent the relevant service teams and services in regional meetings and processes. o Incident Management and vendor cases follow-up as part of Follow-the-Sun supporting efforts.QUALIFICATIONS  Training & Experience . BS Computer Science or other technical degree and/or related experience. . Minimum 5 years of system administration experience in large organization. . Minimum 3 years of technical management including team management and IT project management . Proven rich experience with operational implementations for any of these: o Windows/Linux OS, Software Deployment & Configuration Management (SCCM, Intune, Chef, Ansible, Yum Repository). o ITSM (Incident Management, Change Management, Problem Management) o Scrum/Kanban . Experience with cloud computing will be a good asset. . PMP, Scrum or DevOps certification will be a good asset. Skills & Knowledge . Strong problem-solving skills and critical thinking skills allowing you to make decisions quickly in an environment where you'll need to multitask and prioritize. . Strong interpersonal communication skills - Oral and Written Comprehension of English & Chinese. . Ability to make complex information accessible to technical and non-technical audiences & all levels of management. . Strong knowledge of system administration principles. . Good knowledge of Linux OS, and various system management technologies and automation tools such as Chef, Ansible, Kubernetes. . Good understanding of ITIL (V3/V4) at concept level. . Good understanding of Agile Project Management at concept level. . The familiarity with ITSM and project management tools such as ServiceNow and Jira will be a good asset. . The familiarity with any systems monitoring and availability software such as Microsoft SCOM, Prometheus, Zabbix, Moogsoft, and Grafana will be a good assetADDITIONAL INFORMATION  WE OFFER YOU Competitive salary, bonusfor your performance, medical services to keep you safe and sound, meal tickets to use them wherever you want and free access to relaxing and fitness room. But most of all, we guarantee you'll appreciate our culture and working environment. Ubisoft is a leading creator, publisher and distributor of interactive entertainment and services, with a rich portfolio of world-renowned brands, including Assassin's Creed, Just Dance, Tom Clancy's video game series, Rayman, Far Cry and Watch Dogs. The teams throughout Ubisoft's worldwide network of studios and business offices are committed to delivering original and memorable gaming experiences across all popular platforms, including consoles, mobile phones, tablets and PCs. Come and join our team of over 19,000 professionalsand help us create original and memorable experiences for the world!

 Human-led and tech-empowered since 2002, Walmart Global Tech India delivers innovative solutions to the biggest retailer in the world Walmart. By leveraging emerging technologies, we create omnichannel shopping experiences for our customers, across the globe and help them save money and live better. Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people, and put a smile on their face. Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech. Were a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists, and service professionals within Walmart, the worlds largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. A core philosophy at Walmart is operating with everyday low cost (EDLC). We use technology to operate smarter and deliver everyday low prices (EDLP) to customers and members.

Interact closely for requirements with Business owners and technical teams both within India and across the globe.

 The Hub is key to our business strategy. Weve grown quickly since our inception in 1998, and our continued global growth through market expansion is one of our five goals. We believe that this strategic investment in the India Tech Hub will support our growth, elevate the athletic apparel shopping experience and increase the global talent pool for our current and future technology needs. The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems.  Human-led and tech-empowered since 2002, Walmart Global Tech India delivers innovative solutions to the biggest retailer in the world Walmart.  Retail and Emerging Tech: This is the team which builds reusable technologies that aid in acquiring customers, onboarding and empowering merchants besides ensuring a seamless experience for both these stakeholders. They also optimize tariffs and assortment, adhering to the Walmart philosophy - Everyday Low Cost. In addition to ushering in affordability, they also create personalized experiences for customers the omnichannel way, across all channels - in-store, on the mobile app and websites.

We focus on real-time indexing pipelines, web crawling, streaming analytics, distributed machine learning infrastructure. About Advance Auto Parts
 Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider that serves both professional installer and do-it-yourself customers. As of October 5, 2019, Advance operated 5,000 stores and 152 Worldpac branches in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The Company also serves 1,260 independently owned Carquest branded stores across these locations in addition to Mexico, the Bahamas, Turks and Caicos and British Virgin Islands. The Advance Global Capability Center (GCC) in Hyderabad, India, opened in 2019. The team is responsible for the creation and evolution of the modern Advance Auto Parts service-based platform. Comprised of key core services including Order Management, real time Inventory Availability, Pricing, and more, the team will provide a structured way to develop and evolve service implementations. Key to this approach is the instantiation of an API-centric developer ecosystem that enables solutions to easily construct consumer-facing applications by accessing these platform services. With a product-centric discipline, the platform enables a framework to evolve back-end in services in parallel, ultimately driving faster agility and time-to-market of key features, enabling Advance Auto Parts Mission of having a Passion for Customers. Passion for Yes.

 Key Responsibilities

 Work with business stakeholders, project managers, business analysts, and other IT teams to understand the business needs and their requirements.
 Work with a nimble team of software engineers and enterprise architects to ensure the solutions meet our business needs using Agile methodologies in a fast-paced environment.
 Will often require to take a lead role in the entire development cycle, conduct design and code reviews, and have a heavy input throughout the process, from requirements to production deployment.
 Create technical system specifications and ensure documentation remains current throughout all phases of the SDLC. Raise up opportunities, enhancements, and process improvements. Communicate timely status, including any potential risks/issues of the assignments to management.
 Research, design, define, develop, test, document and implement new service APIs or changes to existing services. Participate in test planning, development, and execution for integration and system testing.
 Learn new software tools and skills as needed. Keep up with technologies.
 Provide mentoring to other development staff on technical topics.
 Support and maintain applications utilizing required tools and technologies. Ensure applications are scalable and operate efficiently in the production environment.
 Ability to research issues across multiple key systems and databases. Assist customers and team members on issue resolution and problem solving.
 Participate in an on call rotation to provide system support outside of normal working hours.
 Comfortable working in an open, dynamic, rapidly changing environment where collaboration is crucial.
 Extended hours may require during peak workloads or special projects.
 Must be self-motivated and take initiative.


 Required Skills:

 4+ years of experience in java middle-tier applications in a J2EE environment within the US.
 Strong familiarity with API management, micro-services, Java/J2EE application stacks .
 Strong experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment.
 Experience in large scale applications either public facing web applications or applications with large numbers of concurrent users.
 Experience with either on-line or in-store retail selling applications.
 Deep technical hands-on experience developing in REST/JSON or SOAP/XML Experience developing solutions in AWS, Azure, and/or Google Cloud Platform.
 Experience with Docker, or related container-oriented technologies (i.e. Docker Enterprise Edition, Kubernetes, etc.). Comfortable implementing continuous integration / continuous delivery process for applications using technologies such as Jenkins and Git.
 Experience with Test Driven Development, including writing and implementing automated unit, system, and integration tests.
 Experience with relational databases (Oracle 11g or above, SQL Server). Experience with NoSQL databases including Cassandra and MongoDB.
 Experience building micro-services using Spring Boot.
 Experience building applications that work with IBM MQ, JBoss and Tomcat, JPA and Hibernate.
 Working knowledge of EJB 3 or above Experience developing and deploying applications on Linux/Unix/AIX servers.
 Experience creating and consuming REST API services with JSON.
 Experience creating and configuring deployments in Jenkins.
 Experience using Unix command line and Bash/Shell/Python scripting to automate tasks, etc.
 Experience with Subversion (SVN) and GIT source control; Maven and Ant; JIRA, Confluence, Grails, web security experience such as WS-Security; Eclipse based IDEs.
 Experience using JUnit and Gatling to write automated tests.
 Experience with designing and conducting performance/stress tests on applications, analyzing and leveraging these results to improve application throughput and response time.
 Exceptional customer relationship skills including the ability to discover the true requirements underlying feature requests, recommend alternative technical and business approaches, work with architects to come to an agreed technical approach, and lead development efforts to meet aggressive timelines with optimal solutions.
 Ability to work collaboratively with or lead cross-functional teams with minimal supervision.
 Ability to drive consensus within a team and influence outcomes in significant technical decision-making.
 Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal communication skills to work with different business groups as well as IT partners (enterprise architects, vendors, etc.) at all levels within the organization.


 Demonstrated critical thinking skills:

 Extreme attention to detail and organization in all aspects of the system development.
 Enterprise level services/APIs often require every detail to be carefully designed and developed to achieve high availability, reliability, and scalability to meet our users needs.
 Person in this role will often be writing real-time service APIs that are critical to business success.
 A strong technical vision. Ability to understand, master, and be able to prototype with new technologies quickly.
 Person in this role needs to be able to quickly understand and solve unique and undocumented programming problems. Open-minded, willing to consider multiple options, sources, perspectives, and possible solutions. Ask probing questions and research as a basis for making design decisions and judging quality; understand the true reason behind the request rather than just accepting an initial thought or proposed solution.
 Proactive and willing to contribute ideas. Not afraid to ask questions.
 Ability to effectively plan, organize and prioritize multiple streams of activity. Adapt well to changes.
 Demonstrated ability to establish priorities, organize, and plan work to satisfy established timeframes; meet commitments and multi-task in a fast-paced work environment with a high-level of accuracy and efficiency.
 Strong integration architecture experience with familiarity of the retail order management process.
 Experience and understanding of enterprise Integration concepts and technologies including ESB, SOA based solutions, transactional systems, message-oriented middleware, canonical message model pattern, JMS, continuous integration framework, REST, SOAP, and web services.
 Broad knowledge of service and client development, different open source framework, application performance tuning, Agile Scrum methodology, software engineering best practices.
 Experience of developing low latency, highly available and scalable distributed systems in an environment with high volumes of transactions.
 Experience of building middle-tier services that integrate with various external systems and vendors with enterprise middleware technologies and different standardized communication protocols.
 Experience of defining system architectures and designs, exploring technical feasibility tradeoffs, and making data-driven decisions.
 Experience in supporting large-scale web applications and enterprise service software.

 Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider that serves both professional installer and do-it-yourself customers. About 7-Eleven
 For 90 years, 7-Eleven has been successfully meeting customers needs. But convenience is now being redefined. Were integrating more than 70,000 stores worldwide with a strong digital and e-commerce presence. Through machine learning, artificial intelligence, and next-level mobile technologies, well meetand exceedour customers ever-changing needs. New consumer behaviors and rapid tech development will continue to transform how and when people shop. With the rapid growth of social media and emerging trends in the Internet of Things, customer behavior is changing. We need to transform ourselves into a software organization by building products and experiences for our customers. Our goal is to transform 7-Eleven into a customer-obsessed, digitally enabled organization. The Global Center in India will play a significant role in the transformation journey at 7-Eleven by building products that support business activities at each of our convenience stores.
 Job Description
 Who we are?
 Imagine working in a place where continuous improvement and innovation is celebrated and rewarded; where fast-paced, high-impact teams come together to positively drive results for one of the largest & most iconic brands in the world.
 7-Eleven is a rapidly growing retailer, known for our highly sought-after products, such as Slurpee and Big Bite. Brain Freeze is a 7-Eleven registered trademark for our 53-year old Slurpee and with over 70,000+ stores globally (more than any other retailer or food service provider), we sell over 14 million a month. But theres a lot more to our story and much more left to be written. We are transforming our business, ensuring we are customer obsessed and digitally enabled to seamlessly link our brick and mortar stores with digital products and services.
 Today we are redefining convenience and the customer experience in big ways...we are fundamentally changing our culture and we want talented, innovative, customer obsessed, and entrepreneurial people like you to come make history with us.

About SAP Fioneer
 DEDIQ is a Munich-based, operative investor focusing on innovative and fast-growing companies. For our new FSI Unit (SAP Fioneer) emerging from a strategic partnership with SAP, we are looking for dynamic new colleagues to build up and develop our financial solutions for the next generation's banking and insurance industry.
 
 Our vision for the banking and insurance companies of the future are customer centric high touch lifestyle institutions with efficient data management, state of the art regulation, based in the cloud.
  
 SAP Fioneer has got all that it takes to tackle a global and fast-pacing software market demanding 
    We are looking for Banking technical consultant to manage our projects for the next generation's banking and insurance industry & also in the newer areas relating to Financial Products Sub-Ledger (FPS) & Financial Services Data Management (FSDM). For the team augmentation we are looking for a Business Process Consultant who can drive these focus topics from a competency standpoint
  

 This unique career opportunity combines all advantages of the RENOWNED AND WORLDWIDE LEADING SAP PLATFORM and the SPEED & AGILITY OF A START-UP ORGANIZATION. With a global network of partners, the operations will focus on more than 10 countries in Europe, North & Latin America and APAC. Possible working locations are Munich, Rhine-Neckar Region or home office combined with willingness to travel.
    Start date is flexible, ideally within the next 2-3 months attitude and top-notch technologies.
  


 Role description


Minimum of Seven (7) years of Development experience of minimum 2 end to end SAP Banking services implementation projects
Good understanding of Banking Business Processes 
Customer facing experience is mandatory including good presentation skills
Hands-on experience in conducting customer workshops
Proven success in contributing within a team environment
Proven ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment
Willing to learn new skills and grow towards the organization's vison
Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills
Technical analysis and documentation of integrated systems
Pro-actively support pre-sales, sales and consulting colleagues with opportunity qualifications and executions
Keep abreast of technology trends and keep up to date with all industry and solution related developments w.r.t Banking / Insurance / Analytical Banking.




Expectation and Tasks

Experience in handling customers and driving innovation

Functional knowledge of any one or more core business process in areas of Deposit Management / Loans Management / Master Contract management, Analytical Banking is an added advantage
Cloud mindset and Cloud solutions knowledge
Advice for optimization and continuous improvement, transformation and innovation
Must be able to work as a team player & should be able to lead the team in culturally diverse environments 



What we offer


Lead the future design of digital finance solutions for the FSI platform of SAP, one of the leading global platforms for financial services customers 
Be part of a small, high performance team and create exceptional, ground breaking solutions
Become a leading FSIS innovator with corresponding market reputation and advance your career to leadership in Finance

About Walmart
 Human-led and tech-empowered since 2002, Walmart Global Tech India delivers innovative solutions to the biggest retailer in the world Walmart. By leveraging emerging technologies, we create omnichannel shopping experiences for our customers, across the globe and help them save money and live better. Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people, and put a smile on their face. Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech. Were a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists, and service professionals within Walmart, the worlds largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. A core philosophy at Walmart is operating with everyday low cost (EDLC). We use technology to operate smarter and deliver everyday low prices (EDLP) to customers and members.

column1: IT Operation and Service Manager – Systems Management
column4: JOB DESCRIPTION  Summary Enterprise Infrastructure, the IT Infrastructure group at Ubisoft, is looking for a talented IT Operation and Service Manager in Shanghai to support their growth as our new colleague. As part of this domain, you'll be joining Ubisoft's IT and more specifically responsible for the corporate IT infrastructure and provides services required by all teams at Ubisoft such as networking, storage, directory services, system configuration and deployment tools. In this role, you will support the World Operation Director and Regional Manager of Enterprise Infrastructure team in overseeing work quality and service level for the team under his/her management. The incumbent will help follow up on and validate the team's work and coach team members all while bringing your communication, analysis and organization capabilities to the table. Responsibilities 1. Work as both an IT Operation and a Service Manager under a matrix management structure. 2. As the Service Manager: o Lead a global IT service team focusing on Linux Systems Management whose team members are located worldwide. o Manage the capacity resource allocation as per priorities to ensure smooth execution of IT strategy and clean roll out of projects. o Develop KPI and data driven system availability reporting and ensure the monitoring of adherence to high operational standards. o Establish a continuous improvement mindset in the team, define and implement the service improvement plans in an iterative approach. o Incident Management and vendor cases follow-up as part of Follow-the-Sun supporting efforts. o Fuel automation efforts to reduce manual operations and increase overall efficiency. o Be the main point of contact regarding feedback about vendor operation quality/reactivity. o Provide operational perspectives on the service architecture and design to clients and provide strategic counsel the visibility. o Represent the team and service in various global meetings and processes. 3. As the IT Operation Manager: o Manage the growth of APAC Systems Management team and the development of its team members. o Focus on creating an environment built on trust, open communication, creativity, and team spirit. o Represent the relevant service teams and services in regional meetings and processes. o Incident Management and vendor cases follow-up as part of Follow-the-Sun supporting efforts.QUALIFICATIONS  Training & Experience . BS Computer Science or other technical degree and/or related experience. . Minimum 5 years of system administration experience in large organization. . Minimum 3 years of technical management including team management and IT project management . Proven rich experience with operational implementations for any of these: o Windows/Linux OS, Software Deployment & Configuration Management (SCCM, Intune, Chef, Ansible, Yum Repository). o ITSM (Incident Management, Change Management, Problem Management) o Scrum/Kanban . Experience with cloud computing will be a good asset. . PMP, Scrum or DevOps certification will be a good asset. Skills & Knowledge . Strong problem-solving skills and critical thinking skills allowing you to make decisions quickly in an environment where you'll need to multitask and prioritize. . Strong interpersonal communication skills - Oral and Written Comprehension of English & Chinese. . Ability to make complex information accessible to technical and non-technical audiences & all levels of management. . Strong knowledge of system administration principles. . Good knowledge of Linux OS, and various system management technologies and automation tools such as Chef, Ansible, Kubernetes. . Good understanding of ITIL (V3/V4) at concept level. . Good understanding of Agile Project Management at concept level. . The familiarity with ITSM and project management tools such as ServiceNow and Jira will be a good asset. . The familiarity with any systems monitoring and availability software such as Microsoft SCOM, Prometheus, Zabbix, Moogsoft, and Grafana will be a good assetADDITIONAL INFORMATION  WE OFFER YOU Competitive salary, bonusfor your performance, medical services to keep you safe and sound, meal tickets to use them wherever you want and free access to relaxing and fitness room. But most of all, we guarantee you'll appreciate our culture and working environment. Ubisoft is a leading creator, publisher and distributor of interactive entertainment and services, with a rich portfolio of world-renowned brands, including Assassin's Creed, Just Dance, Tom Clancy's video game series, Rayman, Far Cry and Watch Dogs. The teams throughout Ubisoft's worldwide network of studios and business offices are committed to delivering original and memorable gaming experiences across all popular platforms, including consoles, mobile phones, tablets and PCs. Come and join our team of over 19,000 professionalsand help us create original and memorable experiences for the world!

Job Title: Storage SME


 Location: Mumbai & Chennai


 Years of Experience: 6 - 9 years


 Skill :- Storage - SAN + DAS + Cloud
    

Detailed JD :- Design, Install, Manage and Support Druva InSync backup as Subject Matter Expert. Administer, develop, test, or demonstrate Storage Backup skills. Perform activities across one or more teams or clients, including designing, implementing and maintaining backup/recovery, configuration management & SAN Administration. Provide input for modification of procedures and documentation used for problem resolution and day-to-day maintenance. 
     

Storage & Backup Administration: 


7 years of min experience in managing SAN storage with administration on Enterprise grade storage array like HP and NetApp along with experience in managing Enterprise grade Backup environment 
Design, Install, configure & Upgrades Storage arrays & Replication setup. 
Performing provisioning & decommissioning, Host Remediation, LUN creation / Deletion / expansion / Storage path multipathing software / capacity management. 
Experience of working on SAN Switches, Zoning, Upgrades and Decommissioning. 
Handling Performance issue, latency, IOPS and throughput individual environment per se 
-Ensure Storage data security with proper access and user management, handle administrative task for Block, File & -Object storage and SAN switches 
     

Experience in managing Enterprise grade Backup environment with experience on Druva inSync backup along with archiving solution on Cloud storage. 
Design Implement & configure Backup Architecture, replication, installing software to backup data. 
Experience of Policy creation & deletion, Managing the attributes of Polices like backup windows 
Administration using Backup console, troubleshooting backup failure and providing resolutions to issues occurring in the environment. 
-Involve in call to trouble shoot P1/ P2 issue related to Storage & Backup. Experience of Migration form EOL hardware to -New platform, Replication configuration & DR activities. Guide and mentor L1 Storage/Backup team, 
     

Create SOP's, automate task for monitoring and provisioning. 
Sound Knowledge of Virtualization and OS environment (RHEL and Windows) dependencies for Storage & Backup environment. 
Should able to perform configure DC-DR and should able to perform DC-DR Failover/Failback. 
Should have good customer management skills 
Should have experience in optimizing Storage & backup environment. 
Have worked in 24/7 and on call support scenarios and as Team lead / SME. 
Good at partnering, innovating, and making things happen
